name: Albert Einstein

milestones.milestone_0: Proposed the General Theory of Relativity
milestones.milestone_1: Came up with the Mass-Energy Equivalence formula
milestones.milestone_2: Won the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1921
milestones.milestone_3: Was named 'Man of the Century' by TIME Magazine

famous_quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
